location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has a hole in the text.

mods.abstract: Letter provides a summary of recent sales of cloth and woolens and gives an update of political developments in Persia including negotiations with Carim Caun [Karim Khan] and news of three Turkish (Ottoman) armies approaching Persia. Shipped by Hamdan Carack Boat.
